title: Cho'Gath Skins and what they tell about their players
body:
> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XKiI2khW,comment-id=001f,timestamp=2015-05-12T04:31:56.629+0000)
> 
> I like this idea. It might not be practical per se but it is very funny and I can't help but wonder what you'd say about champions I like >:D

> [{quoted}](name=DJxxSmokey,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=1UiMgHKa,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-05-12T02:21:51.969+0000)
> 
> This are fun and funny to read but I feel sad when I come across the skin I own and it says bad things :( I know these are for jokes but still.

> [{quoted}](name=Toa of Death,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=gtijOM2A,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-11T20:50:01.694+0000)
> 
>  These are hilarious keep them coming.

> [{quoted}](name=chipi99,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XKiI2khW,comment-id=001a00000000,timestamp=2015-05-12T17:03:29.813+0000)
> 
> Hey , I am offended.

Thank you so much for the feedback on the first few three posts! I will continue the series with {{champion:31}} ! I might be making these too quickly, maybe I'll start making these a series since the Draven one exploded, and the Yasuo and Nasus ones got attention but not nearly as much. 

Disclaimer since I feel I need one: THESE ARE FOR FUN, DO NOT TAKE THESE WITH 100% SERIOUSNESS PLES BOSS (75% serious max cap). 

**Classic Cho'Gath {{champion:31}}**
As with all Classic skins, there are two possibilities that could arise from owning such a skin.
1. Beware free-week (lets be real we all own cho'gath), as the sudden popularity of Cho'Gath (I'm looking at YOU BJERGSEN :'c) has sprouted the non so common champion to being one of the top ban/picks of thie meta. With this popularity comes the new-comers, with new-comers comes the mistakes, and with the mistakes comes your rage and anger, because a cho that goes AP mage and no tank with 0 stacks is coming to your late-game soon c:
2. If you see a Classic Cho'Gath in ranked, I'm sorry. There really is no difference between these two options, these Cho'Gaths want to simply resurrect those 1337 Bjerg plays, and will a majority of the time, fail. Rupture-Flash-Silence-Feast onto a Zed just like Bjerg did? Easy right? You'll find that this mentality will soon land you in some muddy water. 

**Nightmare Cho'Gath {{champion:31}}*
The Cho'Gath of your nightmares. No, seriously. 
08:21 [All] 14cmganja420: report this lee, literally camping bot won't come no communication
15:33 [All] 14cmganja420: wtf!! should i buy a tent for you? stay in silver scrub
20:45 [All] 14cmganja420: lol team wont ff, who wants free kills

Mid, Top, Jungle, you name it. Doesn't matter the role, the only way you're going to win that game is to camp that lane. 

**Gentleman Cho'Gath{{champion:31}}**
Although the price tag on this skin is generous, don't let the idea that only a skilled Cho wields this skin, because lo and behold, the Gentleman Cho'Gath skin is a JUICY contradiction (starburst commercial of fancy scottish ppl for those who don't.. nvm). These Gentlemen are probably going to be the saltiest players that you encounter, BUT YOU WON'T KNOW IT UNTIL IT'S TOO LATE. They will start off the game without a word, cursing every death and mistake under their breathes, and not in chat, but once a mistake by a teammate ends up benefiting his laning foe, then it'll begin. Sure the Cho is good at what he does, but if you want to keep your sanity intact, never forget about the /mute button. 

**Loch Ness Cho'Gath{{champion:31}}**
A rare beauty it is. Loch Ness Cho'Gaths are a sight to marvel at, because you'll almost never see one. And they are almost always NOT TOO BAD at League of Legends. The reason why I say that it is one of the rarest is because the only time you'll see one is when they try to coordinate abyssal-oceanic champions together. Loch Ness Cho'Gath will usually accompany a Deep Sea Kog'Maw, a Deep Terror Thresh, and maybe sometimes if you're lucky... A Deep One Kass. 

**Jurassic Cho'Gath{{champion:31}}**
Jurassic Cho'Gath is the representation of a wonderful summoner. Congratulations, you have a homie who loves playing League, but more importantly, loves playing Cho'Gath. Not only will they be a great person to be with, but they'll be key to your victory. Add them and play with them more to delevop a fruitful relationship (and an unintentional Friendly banner abuse). Their humor is very controversial and unconventional so sometimes you'll say wtf instead of laughing, but realize that it only builds to their character. So laugh, my friend, because I guarentee that you won't. 

**Battlecast Prime Cho'Gath{{champion:31}}**
Here we go. You're in your S2 promos for the 3rd time, because the past two times you've either had a Riven who told you, 
[00:41] KLSaruGamer: Hey, I'm in Gold 5 but I'm trying to lose to duo with my Bronze 5 friend so I'll be intentionally feeding (real player who said real thing, name is slightly changed so I won't get flagged for anything).
or a Yasuo who never connected (grr..), and on you're first game you see this Cho'Gath. You tell your team that this is your series and you wish your team good luck and ask for coordination, and get responses from 3 players... but not from this Cho'Gath. He instead says 'invade, come' and your team follows sketchily. 45 seconds later you walk out with 2 kills to Cho, and the entire game is just his continual roaming and killing. He doesn't say a WORD to you, just continues getting larger and larger until it is literally conceivable that he is capable of 1v5ing. Battlecast Prime is the epitome of gameplay, the DEFINITION of smurf, and has what is known as silent charisma. Congratulations on your freelo. 

THANK THANK THANK YOU FOR THE FEEDBACK LEAGUE COMMUNITY /KINDLEJACK. 

Have a nice day~ SquishyTentacles{{champion:161}} 

Link to my other threads:
{{champion:119}}:http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/XKiI2khW-draven-skins-and-what-they-tell-about-the-players?show=flat

These are hilarious.

I think you should really do {{champion:92}}  next.
Battle Bunny Riven literally worst in history.  I have never seen a battle bunny riven not do horrible.  I have never seen a battle bunny riven that wasn't a rager.

I tend to find that players with the Battle Bunny Riven tend to play the worst of the bunch, are the most arrogant, and will always have a reason why they did poorly that doesn't include themselves. If they ever do well, they are the least humble and will shower themselves with praise after you spoon-fed them 4 kills in lane as a jungler and tell the rest of their team they "carried".

On the flipside, I've found the rare Redeemed Riven players are usually the most silent and tend to do very well.
T_T am I the only cho that's base skin, goes full tank (absolutly no ap items/runes/masteries) and maxes e first and still does well? T_T

I roll Battlecast, and it's true that I usually don't speak a lot in chat. I also do pretty well, although I haven't really played him a lot since he became mainstream, so that might have changed. :c
What about that new Prehistoric one?

I do gentleman cho, and I'm one of the nicest players I see =[
but DO {{champion:16}} NEXT!!! pls =]

i love these posts, they make me (and obviously a lot of others) smile when reading them, thank you very much for this great contribution....

and i think putting them out every few days or even one a week sounds fine, with as many champ as there are it will take some time, but always feel free to take as much time as u need....

a possible thought, condense them into a single thread.... post all the pictures of the champs, and as you fill out the champion from top to bottom edit the post to include new information, this way hopefully it will get stickied..... just a thought

{{champion:41}} Ive noticed alot of changes with the skins on GP too. They always act how the skins look.
Oh, these are fun to read. I wanna see more, but for the sake of diversity, I kinda want to see a lady champ done next. Maybe {{champion:267}}?
I suggest your next report be on the Prince of Hatred himself, Teemo.

I play Gentlemen Cho'Gath, and I talk like a gentlemen the entire game. I always start with "En Garde Fair Ladies and Esteemed Gentlemen! I Challenge thee to a duel!". People love it. Some random dude once gifted me Battlecast Cho'Gath when I did it.

Sweet... Jurassic Cho player here.

Jurassic World hype!

I **LOVE** my Jurassic Cho skin.
But i really want Gentleman. Your description of him though...QQ
YOU POKED MY HEART
jurassic cho errytime. perfect description of me. eventually ill get my nightmare cho tho

These are too nice, man.  I've never seen gentleman Cho do good.

One time (this was back pre-S1 where even in ranked it was anything goes) I had an Annie in Wonderland/Gentleman Cho'gath duo top.  They both fed their fucking asses off.  They lost inner tower in ten minutes.

The thing you forget with each of your commentaries is that there is a third option for the classic skin: **The purist**. They only play that champion because they love that champion and they don't need a skin to show how amazing they are or how dedicated they are.
These are fantastic and so true! I'd like to hear about {{champion:45}}, {{champion:35}}, or {{champion:8}}.
{{champion:54}}  or {{champion:105}}  pl0x

Heh, Jurassic Cho is actually my favorite. (At least, until I win the lottery and can afford Riot's e$port$ gear) Most of my jokes are related to my IGN rather than dinosaurs, though.

Fun fact: Jurassic Cho'gath has a /taunt animtion UNIQUE to any of the "regular" Cho skins; while the other pleb Chos stick their secondary arms in the ground and roar, Jurassic Cho SNAPS HIS OWN HEAD OFF. How cool is that?

TL;DR buy Dino'gath now, become Bjergsen.

As a Cho main, I can confirm my personality switches to all of these when I use each of these skins.

My friend had Battlecast Prime Cho on his account. He was a pretty decent Cho player. I lost all hope for anybody using the skin when his sister stole the account and changed the password because "I wanted a level 30 account". She starts using Cho and claims "I'm good at him because I have an expensive skin". I have no respect for users of Battlecast Prime Cho'gath.
